attributes.title: Huge disappointment!!
attributes.review: I got this app hoping for helpful information about the upcoming election, but was met instead with cluttered, hard to navigate pages. Not only was the information nearly impossible to extract, but the app kept crashing whenever I tried to click on the different sections. Terrible! Do not get this!

attributes.title: Horrible app for a horrible president
attributes.review: I am not a TikTokker or anything like that? but I got this app because I wanted to see what all the buzz was about with our President but I can tell that this app is just like everything else about this man: GARBAGE. I strongly advise the Apple store to remove this app because it is useless and a very boring use of my time. Iâ€™m disappointed but not surprised.

attributes.title: Too cluttered
attributes.review: The moment I opened this app, I saw a picture of trump so I deleted it just like any normal person would. However, my wall screen turned to trumps face. I was very mad because my old wall paper is now missing. In fact, all my pictures turned into trumps face. I had to power my phone off for a week! Do not recommend this app.

attributes.title: Worst app ever, what a waste of space
